content: thicknesses *insert hook in unused loop of next st of row 1 and in the front loop of next st of row 7 yarn over and draw through all loops on hook making a slip st repeat from * across turn change to smaller hook tighten loop on hook slightly body row 9 chain 1 bl-single_crochet in each slip st across turn row 10 rs chain 1 work row 2 of stitch pattern continue even in stitch pattern until piece measures 5 3/4 6 6 1/4 7 /14 5 15 16 18 cm from beginning including rolled hem shape armholes row 1 chain 1 slip st in first 2 sts chain 1 work in stitch pattern across to last 2 sts leave last 2 sts unworked turn 39 41 43 45 sts excluding slip sts row 2 chain 1 decrease work in stitch pattern across to last 2 single_crochet decrease turn 37 39 41 43 sts continue even in stitch pattern until armhole measures 4 1/4 4 1/2 4 3/4 5 /11 11 5 12 12 5 cm from beginning of armhole shaping shape first shoulder row 1 chain 1 work in stitch pattern over first 8 8 9 9 sts leave remaining sts unworked turn 8 8 9 9 sts row 2 chain 1 decrease work in stitch pattern across turn 7 7 8 8 sts fasten_off shape second shoulder http //www caron com/projects/baby/ssb_baby_pullover html page 2 of 4 caron international yarns and latch hook kits 09/02/2008 10 12 am skip 21 23 23 25 unworked sts following first shoulder join yarn with slip st in next st row 1 chain 1 work in stitch pattern in same st as join and in each remaining st across turn 8 8 9 9 sts row 2 chain 1 work in stitch pattern to last 2 sts decrease 7 7 8 8 sts fasten_off front work as for back until piece measures 8 1/2 9 9 1/2 10 /21 5 23 24 25 5 cm from beginning including rolled hem 37 39 41 43 sts shape first neck edge and shoulder row 1 chain 1 work in stitch pattern over first 13 13 14 14 sts leave remaining sts unworked turn 13 13 14 14 sts row 2 chain 1 slip st in first 5 sts chain 1 work in stitch pattern across turn 8 8 9 9 sts excluding slip sts row 3 chain 1 work in stitch pattern across to last 2 single_crochet decrease turn 7 7 8 8 sts continue even in stitch pattern until armhole measures same as back armhole fasten_off shape second neck edge and shoulder skip 11 13 13 15 unworked sts following first neck edge join yarn with slip st in next st row 1 chain 1 work in stitch pattern in same st as join and in each remaining st across turn 13 13 14 14 sts row 2 chain 1 work in stitch pattern over first 8 8 9 9 sts leave
